purpose: The email is a call for papers for the MLOps25 workshop, which will be held in conjunction with the 28th European Conference on Artificial Intelligence in October 2025. It invites submissions addressing challenges and advancements in Machine Learning Operations (MLOps), aiming to foster discussions between researchers and practitioners. The email outlines topics of interest, important dates for submissions, review criteria, and publication details for accepted papers.
evidence_sentences: MLOps25 Workshop on Machine Learning Operations
This workshop encourages discussions on bridging the gap between data science experimentation and the reliable operation of ML components in production.
We invite submissions that address the open challenges, latest breakthroughs, and practical use cases in the rapidly evolving field of MLOps.
Submissions are encouraged on, but not limited to, the following topics:
Accepted papers will be published in the CEUR Workshop Proceedings (CEUR-WS.org).
